attributes.action: Remove vaccine mandates. Save the jobs of 70,000 NHS staff members. Save the NHS
attributes.additional_details: The UKs public are now poorer than they have been in the last 50 years. Dismantling the NHS will bring further poverty. Vaccine mandates can be rejected on this basis alone.
attributes.background: We cannot afford to lose 70,000 staff members over vaccine mandates. The NHS is already underfunded and on its knees. You will cripple and destroy our health service if you continue mandating vaccines. There are other methods of encouragement.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not make COVID vaccination a requirement for health and social care workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600872

Do not make covid-19 or flu vaccine a condition of deployment for NHS workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598996
